definition: to start over/to do sth all over again
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
lit. to return in a swirl of dust (idiom)/fig. to regroup and come back even stronger/to make a comeback

sentences.english: It is sound and sound, can be re circulation.
sentences.chinese: 餘音終究是餘音，能循環不能重來。

sentences.english: Eventually, TV reasserted itself into my life.
sentences.chinese: 電視後來在我的生活中捲土重來。

sentences.english: THERE was no return of the mutineers - not so much as another shot out of the woods.
sentences.chinese: 反叛者們沒有捲土重來，樹林中再也沒聽到槍聲。

sentences.english: Thrawn did, though, have some sort of plan to return.
sentences.chinese: 然而，索龍確實想到過捲土重來的計劃。

sentences.english: Of the two, time is the most valuable, for it cannot be replenished.
sentences.chinese: 而其中時間更加貴重，因爲時間是不能重來的。
你們當中大多數人都需要重來。

sentences.english: Ma reflected that if she had the chance to do it again, she probably would not say that.
sentences.chinese: 馬諾表示，如果能重來一次，她可能就不會那樣說了。

sentences.english: Now Pitkowsky, 46, and Trauner, 54, are back.
sentences.chinese: 如今，46歲的皮考斯基和54歲的特勞納捲土重來。

sentences.english: That problem has brought compressed-air energy storage roaring back.
sentences.chinese: 這一問題使得‘壓縮空氣儲能’捲土重來。

sentences.english: His hatred of Trina came back upon him like a returning surge.
sentences.chinese: 他對屈麗娜的痛恨象捲土重來的浪潮，又回覆了。

sentences.english: And quite possibly, if placed in that situation, you might do it again.
sentences.chinese: 而且很有可能，如果重來一次，你還是會做的。

sentences.english: How much love can come back again, how many people are waiting, steady.
sentences.chinese: 有多少愛可以重來，有多少人值得等待，安分守己。

sentences.english: When you run your tests, you can then use the weight to distribute your results.
sentences.chinese: 當您運行測試時，您可以使用權重來分配您的結果。

sentences.english: They squat in illegal structures, which Beijing destroys as it keeps expanding.
sentences.chinese: 他們蜷縮在違章建築裏，被政府摧毀又捲土重來。

sentences.english: And the beast shall come forth surrounded by a roiling cloud of vengeance.
sentences.chinese: 野獸將靠復仇之雲捲土重來。

sentences.english: Three days later, Kearns, once again driving the Galaxie, reappeared for his appointment with Neill.
sentences.chinese: 三天後，卡恩斯捲土重來，如約見到了內爾。

definition: to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
wind and rain/the elements/trials and hardships
old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste
to turn round/to turn one's head/later/by and by
a snap of the fingers/a short moment/in a flash/in the twinkling of an eye
